title: Sr Systems Admin
job_description:
Neustar, Inc. is a leading global information services provider driving the connected world forward with trusted, holistic identity resolution. More information is available at https://www.home.neustar.

Job Requisition:R-1847 Sr Systems Admin (Open)Primary Location:BANGALOREJob Description:

Level 3 Apps:

Responsible for planning, deploying, supporting, maintaining and troubleshooting applications, services and solutions within Neustar's Order Management System (OMS) Systems Administration and Application Support team

Plan, install, administer and troubleshoot applications, systems and services in production, lab/test, and development environments.

Administer and support high availability mission critical applications and systems.

Analyze and resolve complex problems including interoperability issues, issues caused by hardware or software.

Develop and implement processes and procedures for Automated Deployments and Continuous Integration.

Partner with internal teams and take initiative to implement and improve organizational processes and procedures.

Lead integration of applications and services with network management tools.

Create and maintain documentation as it relates to system configuration, mapping, processes, and operational support.

Technical Skills:

3 to 5 years’ experience with Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring/JSF/ Angular JS.

3 to 5 years’ experience with BPEL , Tomcat and Apache server.

3 to 5 years’ experience with automation tools such as chef and Jenkins.

5 plus years’ experience with Database driven applications ORACLE/MySQL.

Very good knowledge on Linux production application environment.

Experience with source code control GIT application

Neustar does not accept unsolicited resumes from external firms or agencies. Neustar will not be responsible for placement fees associated with unsolicited resumes.
